post.author: kensaundm31
post.body: I've imported the mancubus MD5 mesh into 3ds and then one of the anims. How do I make the mesh model strike the anim pose I've loaded?

post.author: der_ton
post.body: You move the timeline slider or press play on the animation control.

post.author: kensaundm31
post.body: Thanks, der_ton. And for the plug.
